game.name: Bendy and the Dark Revival
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Remote Play on TV, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Bendy and the Dark Revival® is a first-person survival horror game set in the creepiest cartoon studio to ever exist. Discover the truth. Escape the studio. Above all, fear the Ink Demon…and survive.
